public_identity.headline: Design leadership for complex systems — trust-critical digital products and services across EU and MENA.
public_identity.positioning: I help leaders ship trust‑critical digital products and services across EU and MENA — aligning strategy, delivery, and governance so teams move fast without losing quality.

summary.one_liner: Strategic innovation & design director with 20+ years leading trust‑critical digital ecosystems across EU/MENA.
what_i_do: Define product and innovation strategies that align user experience with business outcomes.
Set up and lead AI‑integrated product organisations where design, technology, and data work as one.
Guide transformation programs through Design Sprints, Agile delivery, and measurable experimentation.
how_i_work: Systems thinking and service models that match operational reality.
Decision artefacts (principles, patterns, state models, acceptance criteria) that survive delivery.
Governance that scales quality across teams.
disclaimers: Some work is NDA‑constrained; public case studies are written to be NDA‑safe and focus on problems, constraints, approach, and outcomes.
This file is self‑published; every measurable claim should include at least one evidence link in the 'evidence' section.

proof_map.label: Proof map — claims to evidence
proof_map.principle: No claim without a trace. Each capability is backed by at least one public evidence link.

claims.claim: VP-level design leadership: align strategy, delivery, and governance so teams ship fast without losing quality.
Agentic Experience (AX): workflow orchestration, guardrails, explainability cues, and adoption patterns in trust-sensitive contexts.
Digital identity/privacy UX: consent + control, safe defaults, auditability and traceability cues designed into journeys.
Service design for ecosystems: blueprinting operational truth, designing exceptions first, reducing support debt after launch.
Multi-market scaling: designed common core + local layers to prevent fragmentation across regions and channels.
State design & edge cases: predictable states, recoverability, and auditable status in high-stakes flows.
250+ workshops: executive alignment, decision-making, and delivery-ready artefacts at scale.
